This game works perfectly on my Soft-Modded USA NTSC Xbox.

OK, it isn't "perfect", because the game-play is a little choppy, but that has nothing to do with the ISO itself. I'm sure that it is the limitations of the original Xbox hardware (cpu, memory).

I burned the ISO with ease using ImgBurn, a really cool free burning program.

As for Xbox 360, I think that you have to have a hardware mod chip to play home-burned games.

Thanks Titi26!!!! U Da Man!!

I'll add that you don't need to "make the ISO a certain way" with this download. It has already been made for you!!!

Just download, burn it, and play, IF you have a modded Xbox.

Also, I still have the stock HDD in my Xbox, so I play games from the DVD discs; maybe that is why it is a little choppy.
